works.description:
The text within the footer section on every page of our website. This text includes the following: 

"Are you moving abroad? Maybe, like thousands of other homeowners, you're facing the prospect of repossession? Perhaps you're thinking 'I need to sell my home fast' because of a family bereavement or a broken property chain, or perhaps due to personal injury. Whatever the reason, National Homebuyers can help.

We can offer cash for homes, creating a speedy sales process, avoiding all the hassle usually associated with Selling a property on the open market. Stop Repossession House Repossession is a horrible reality facing many homeowners in the UK, particularly with the current instability of the economy. We can help you stop repossession by purchasing your home. We will purchase your home quickly thus making house repossession avoidable. National Homebuyers is fast purchase Property Company."

This company has copied our text and simply replaced our company name with their own. We will be changing our content shortly as we believe this duplication is having a negative impact on our organic search results. If our content has changed by the time you see this, please contact me and I can provide detailed screen shots and webpage downloads proving that on the 31/07/2012 this companies website has indeed copied ours.
